effect.Name: Vector Gradient Bloom (Switch)
effect.description: "Vector Gradient Blur" shader divides an object's texture into smaller fragments and takes colors from points, then these points serve as colors for gradients and additionally a bloom effect is applied.
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Vector Gradient Bloom (Switch) Shader | 1.1 (19.09.2025) */
parameter.description: "Vector Gradient Blur" shader divides an object's texture into smaller fragments and takes colors from points, then these points serve as colors for gradients and additionally a bloom effect is applied.

parameter.name: Blending Mode
parameter.description: This variable determines which color will be the basis for modification. Set to 0 means it will be the texture of the object and set to 1 it will be the background.

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.

parameter.name: Segments
parameter.description: This variable determines how many fragments the texture should be divided into.

parameter.name: Blur Scale
parameter.description: This variable determines how strong the gradient should be. The closer to 0 is the gradient less visible and the closer to 1 is more.

parameter.name: ( Compatibility )
parameter.description: Here you will find options that have changed, but you can still achieve the previous effect.

parameter.name: Is Fusion Version Older Than 296?
parameter.description: (Only applies to Android and iOS!) This variable determines whether to use the newer background formatting. In Clickteam Fusion 2.5 for build 295.10 and earlier, the background texture was flipped along the Y axis, but this was changed in build 296.1. Check this option if you are using an older build!
